articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: In 1982, a physics joke gone wrong sparked the invention of the emoticon - Ars Technica
articles.description: A simple proposal on a 1982 electronic bulletin board helped sarcasm flourish online.

articles.title: Frozen 40,000-Year-Old Mammoth Reveals Shockingly Intact RNA and Hidden Genetic Secrets - SciTechDaily
articles.description: For the first time, researchers have uncovered Ice Age RNA preserved within permafrost mammoth tissue, offering a rare glimpse into real-time gene activity from tens of millennia ago. Researchers at Stockholm University have, for the first time ever, isolated…
articles.content: A new breakthrough shows that some of biology’s most fragile molecules can persist far deeper into the past than scientists ever imagined. By decoding ancient gene activity from Ice Age remains, rese… [+6576 chars]
